articles.title: Ron DeSantis government bans new advanced African American history course - BBC
articles.description: The ban has outraged some parents, who called it a "direct attack" on Black communities.
articles.content:
Florida officials have blocked the introduction of a new advanced-level high school course that teaches African American history.
